mapper.select: select s1.label,count(1) cc from project_declare t left join sys_dict s1 on t.level=s1.value and s1.type='project_degree' and s1.del_flag='0' where t.level!='5' and t.del_flag='0' and s1.id is not null group by s1.label

select s1.label,count(1) cc from project_declare t left join sys_dict s1 on t.type=s1.value and s1.type='project_type' and s1.del_flag='0' where t.del_flag='0' and t.level!='5' and t.level is not null and s1.id is not null group by s1.label

select s1.label,o.name,count(1) cc from project_declare t left join sys_dict s1 on t.level=s1.value and s1.type='project_degree' and s1.del_flag='0' left join sys_user u on t.leader=u.id left join sys_office o on u.office_id=o.id where t.level!='5' and t.del_flag='0' and s1.id is not null group by s1.label,o.name
select t.name from sys_office t where t.grade='2' and t.del_flag='0'

select * from ( select SUBSTRING(pd.apply_time,1,4) year from project_declare pd LEFT join act_yw ay on ay.id=pd.actyw_id where pd.apply_time is not null and pd.del_flag='0' and ay.rel_id is not null UNION select SUBSTRING(pm.sub_time,1,4) year from pro_model pm LEFT join act_yw ay on ay.id=pm.actyw_id where pm.sub_time is not null and pm.del_flag='0' and ay.rel_id is not null ) m group by year ORDER by year
select d.label from sys_dict d inner JOIN pro_project p on d.value=p.type where d.type='project_style' and p.del_flag='0' and p.type is not null and p.pro_type='1,' and d.del_flag='0'

select year,label,count(*) as sum,t1.pid from ( select SUBSTRING(pd.apply_time,1,4) year,pd.id ,pd.actyw_id ,ay.rel_id pid from project_declare pd LEFT join act_yw ay on ay.id=pd.actyw_id LEFT join pro_project pp on pp.id=ay.rel_id where pd.apply_time is not null and pd.del_flag='0' and ay.rel_id is not null and pp.del_flag='0' UNION select SUBSTRING(pm.sub_time,1,4) year ,pm.id,pm.actyw_id ,ay.rel_id pid from pro_model pm LEFT join act_yw ay on ay.id=pm.actyw_id LEFT join pro_project pp on pp.id=ay.rel_id where pm.sub_time is not null and pm.del_flag='0' and ay.rel_id is not null and pp.del_flag='0' ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( select d.label ,d.value ,p.project_name,p.pro_type,p.id pid from sys_dict d inner JOIN pro_project p on d.value=p.type where d.type='project_style' and p.type is not null and p.pro_type='1,' and d.del_flag='0' ) t2 on t1.pid=t2.pid where label is not null GROUP BY label,year
